import numpy as np
import pandas as pd
import datetime
import seaborn as sns
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
source.a3ab80c1:
plt.figure(figsize=(25,10))
figure = sns.countplot(x='brewery_name', data=df, order=df['brewery_name'].value_counts().iloc[:10].index)
plt.xlabel('Brewery', fontsize=20) 
plt.ylabel('Number of checkins', fontsize=20)
plt.suptitle('Most popular breweries', fontsize=26)
plt.show()

plt.figure(figsize=(25,10))
figure = sns.countplot(y='beer_name', data=df, order=df['beer_name'].value_counts().iloc[:10].index)
plt.ylabel('Beer', fontsize=20) 
plt.xlabel('Number of checkins', fontsize=20)
plt.suptitle('Most popular beers', fontsize=26)
plt.show()

plt.figure(figsize=(15,6))
figure = df['rating_score'].hist(bins=np.linspace(0,5,21))
plt.ylabel('Number of check-ins', fontsize=20) 
plt.xlabel('Rating', fontsize=20)
plt.suptitle('Rating histogram', fontsize=26)
plt.show()
